item.title: adjust window edge in amlogic android system with u-boot bootloader
item.description: configure window edge Related files include/configs/gxl_p211_v1.h, line 145, #define CONFIG_EXTRA_ENV_SETTINGS \ "firstboot=1\0"\ "upgrade_step=0\0"\ "jtag=apee\0"\ "loadaddr=1080000\0"\ "outputmode=720p50hz\0" \ "hdmimode=720p50hz\0" \ "cvbsmode=576cvbs\0" \ "1080p_h=1037\0" \ "1080p_w=1843\0" \ "1080p_x=38\0" \ "1080p_y=21\0" \ "1080i_h=1037\0" \ "1080i_w=1843\0" \ "1080i_x=38\0" \ "1080i_y=21\0" \ "720p_h=691\0" \ "720p_w=1222\0" \ "720p_x=32\0" \ "720p_y=14\0" \ "576p_h=545\0" \ "576p_w=680\0" \ "576p_x=20\0" \ "576p_y=15\0" \ "576i_h=545\0" \ "576i_w=680\0" \ "576i_x=20\0" \ "576i_y=15\0" \ "480p_h=433\0" \ "480p_w=649\0" \ "480p_x=35\0" \ "480p_y=23\0" \ "480i_h=433\0" \ "480i_w=649\0" \ "480i_x=35\0" \ "480i_y=23\0" \ "uimode=1080p\0" \ "display_width=1920\0" \ "display_height=1080\0" \ "display_bpp=16\0" \ .
